name: 57 Leaf Clover
quote: Luck is on your side.
description: All random effects are rolled {{Color|u|+1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} times for a {{Color|u|favorable outcome}}.

name: Soldier's Syringe
quote: Increase attack speed.
description: Increases {{Color|d|attack speed}} by {{Color|d|15%}} {{Stack|(+15% per stack)}}.

name: Tougher Times
quote: Chance to block incoming damage.
description: {{Color|h|15%}} {{Stack|(+15% per stack)}} chance to {{Color|h|block}} incoming damage. {{Color|u|Unaffected by luck}}.

name: Brilliant Behemoth
quote: All your attacks explode!
description: All your {{Color|d|attacks explode}} in a {{Color|d|4m}} {{Stack|(+2.5m per stack)}} radius for a bonus {{Color|d|60%}} TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.

name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
quote: Chance to fire a missile.
description: {{Color|d|10%}} chance to fire a missile that deals {{Color|d|300%}} {{Stack|(+300% per stack)}} TOTAL damage.

name: Will-o'-the-wisp
quote: Detonate enemies on kill.
description: On killing an enemy, spawn a {{Color|d|lava pillar}} in a {{Color|d|12m}} {{Stack|(+2.4m per stack)}} radius for {{Color|d|350%}} {{Stack|(+280% per stack)}} base damage.

name: Ceremonial Dagger
quote: Killing an enemy releases homing daggers.
description: Killing an enemy fires out {{Color|d|3}} {{Color|d|homing daggers}} that deal {{Color|d|150%}} {{Stack|(+150% per stack)}} base damage.

name: Monster Tooth
quote: Drop a healing orb on kill.
description: Killing an enemy spawns a {{Color|h|healing orb}} that heals for {{Color|h|8}} plus an additional {{Color|h|2%}} {{Stack|(+2% per stack)}} of {{Color|h|maximum health}}.

name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
quote: Gain 10% chance for hits to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.
description: Your attacks have a {{Color|d|10%}} {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}} chance to '{{Color|d|Critically Strike}}', dealing {{Color|d|double damage}}.

name: Paul's Goat Hoof
quote: Increase movement speed.
description: Increases {{Color|u|movement speed}} by {{Color|u|14%}} {{Stack|(+14% per stack)}}.

name: Hopoo Feather
quote: Gain an extra jump.
description: Gain {{Color|u|+1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} maximum {{Color|u|jump count}}.

name: Ukulele
quote: ...and his music was electric.
description: {{Color|d|25%}} chance to fire {{Color|d|chain lightning}} for {{Color|d|80%}} TOTAL damage on up to {{Color|d|3}} {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} targets within {{Color|d|20m}} {{Stack|(+2m per stack)}}.

name: Leeching Seed
quote: Dealing damage heals you.
description: Dealing damage {{Color|h|heals}} you for {{Color|h|1 {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} health}}.

name: Frost Relic
quote: Killing enemies surrounds you with an ice storm.
description: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an {{Color|d|ice storm}} that deals {{Color|d|1200% damage per second}} and {{Color|u|slows}} enemies by {{Color|u|80%}} for {{Color|u|1.5s}}. The storm {{Color|d|grows with every kill}}, increasing its radius by {{Color|d|2m}}. Stacks up to {{Color|d|18m}} {{Stack|(+12m per stack)}}.

name: Happiest Mask
quote: Chance on killing an enemy to summon a ghost.
description: Killing enemies has a {{Color|d|7%}} chance to {{Color|d|spawn a ghost}} of the killed enemy with {{Color|d|1500%}} damage. Lasts {{Color|d|30s}} {{Stack|(+30s per stack)}}.

name: Bustling Fungus
quote: Heal all nearby allies after standing still for 1 second.
description: After standing still for {{Color|h|1}} second, create a zone that {{Color|h|heals}} for {{Color|h|4.5%}} {{Stack|(+2.25% per stack)}} of your {{Color|h|health}} every second to all allies within {{Color|h|3m}} {{Stack|(+1.5m per stack)}}.

name: Crowbar
quote: Deal bonus damage to enemies above 90% health.
description: Deal {{Color|d|+75%}} {{Stack|(+75% per stack)}} damage to enemies above {{Color|d|90% health}}.

name: Predatory Instincts
quote: 'Critical Strikes' increase attack speed. Stacks 3 times.
description: Gain {{Color|d|5% critical chance}}. {{Color|d|Critical strikes}} increase {{Color|d|attack speed}} by {{Color|d|12%}}. Maximum cap of {{Color|d|36% {{Stack|(+24% per stack)}} attack speed}}.

name: Tri-Tip Dagger
quote: Gain +10% chance to bleed enemies on hit.
description: {{Color|d|10%}} {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}} chance to {{Color|d|bleed}} an enemy for {{Color|d|240%}} base damage.

name: Red Whip
quote: Move fast out of combat.
description: Leaving combat boosts your {{Color|u|movement speed}} by {{Color|u|30%}} {{Stack|(+30% per stack)}}.

name: H3AD-5T v2
quote: Increase jump height. Hold 'Interact' to slam down to the ground.
description: Increase {{Color|u|jump height}}. Creates a {{Color|d|5m-100m}} radius {{Color|d|kinetic explosion}} on hitting the ground, dealing {{Color|d|1000%-10000%}} base damage that scales up with {{Color|d|fall distance}}. Recharges in {{Color|d|10}} {{Stack|(-50% per stack)}} seconds.

name: Warbanner
quote: Drop a Warbanner on level up or starting the Teleporter event. Grants allies attack and movement speed.
description: On {{Color|u|level up}} or starting the {{Color|u|Teleporter event}}, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within {{Color|u|16m}} {{Stack|(+8m per stack)}}. Raise {{Color|d|attack}} and {{Color|u|movement speed}} by {{Color|d|30%}}.

name: Berzerker's Pauldron
quote: Enter a frenzy after killing 4 enemies in quick succession.
description: {{Color|d|Killing 4 enemies}} within {{Color|d|1}} second sends you into a {{Color|d|frenzy}} for {{Color|d|6s}} {{Stack|(+4s per stack)}}. Increases {{Color|u|movement speed}} by {{Color|u|50%}} and {{Color|d|attack speed}} by {{Color|d|100%}}.

name: Old War Stealthkit
quote: Turn invisible at low health.
description: Falling below {{Color|hp|25% health}} causes you to gain {{Color|u|40% movement speed}} and {{Color|u|invisibility}} for {{Color|u|5s}}. Recharges every {{Color|u|30 seconds}} {{Stack|(-50% per stack)}}.

name: Harvester's Scythe
quote: 'Critical Strikes' heal you.
description: Gain {{Color|d|5% critical chance}}. {{Color|d|Critical strikes}} {{Color|h|heal}} for {{Color|h|8}} {{Stack|(+4 per stack)}} {{Color|h|health}}.

name: Cautious Slug
quote: Rapidly heal outside of danger.
description: Increases {{Color|h|base health regeneration}} by {{Color|h|+3 hp/s}} {{Stack|(+3 hp/s per stack)}} while outside of combat.

name: Wax Quail
quote: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward.
description: {{Color|u|Jumping}} while {{Color|u|sprinting}} boosts you forward by {{Color|u|10m}} {{Stack|(+10m per stack)}}.

name: Personal Shield Generator
quote: Gain a recharging shield.
description: Gain a {{Color|h|shield}} equal to {{Color|h|8%}} {{Stack|(+8% per stack)}} of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.

name: N'kuhana's Opinion
quote: Fire haunting skulls when healed.
description: Store {{Color|h|100%}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} of healing as {{Color|h|Soul Energy}}. After your {{Color|h|Soul Energy}} reaches {{Color|h|10%}} of your {{Color|h|maximum health}}, {{Color|d|fire a skull}} that deals {{Color|d|250%}} of your {{Color|h|Soul Energy}} as {{Color|d|damage}}.

name: Medkit
quote: Receive a delayed heal after taking damage.
description: 2 seconds after getting hurt, {{Color|h|heal}} for {{Color|h|20}} plus an additional {{Color|h|5%}} {{Stack|(+5% per stack)}} of {{Color|h|maximum health}}.

name: Fuel Cell
quote: Hold an additional equipment charge. Reduce equipment cooldown.
description: Hold an {{Color|u|additional equipment charge}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}}. {{Color|u|Reduce equipment cooldown}} by {{Color|u|15%}} {{Stack|(+15% per stack)}}.

name: Infusion
quote: Killing an enemy permanently increases your maximum health, up to 100.
description: Killing an enemy increases your {{Color|h|health permanently}} by {{Color|h|1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}}, up to a {{Color|h|maximum}} of {{Color|h|100 {{Stack|(+100 per stack)}} health}}.

name: Unstable Tesla Coil
quote: Shock all nearby enemies every 10 seconds.
description: Fire out {{Color|d|lightning}} that hits {{Color|d|3}} {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} enemies for {{Color|d|200%}} base damage every {{Color|d|0.5s}}. The Tesla Coil switches off every {{Color|d|10 seconds}}.

name: Gasoline
quote: Killing an enemy ignites other nearby enemies.
description: Killing an enemy {{Color|d|ignites}} all enemies within {{Color|d|12m}} {{Stack|(+4m per stack)}} for {{Color|d|150%}} base damage. Additionally, enemies {{Color|d|burn}} for {{Color|d|150%}} {{Stack|(+75% per stack)}} base damage.

name: Sentient Meat Hook
quote: Chance to hook all nearby enemies.
description: {{Color|d|20%}} {{Stack|(+20% per stack)}} chance on hit to {{Color|d|fire homing hooks}} at up to {{Color|d|10}} {{Stack|(+5 per stack)}} enemies for {{Color|d|100%}} TOTAL damage.

name: Bundle of Fireworks
quote: Activating an interactable launches fireworks at nearby enemies.
description: Activating an interactable {{Color|d|launches 8 {{Stack|(+4 per stack)}} fireworks}} that deal {{Color|d|300%}} base damage.

name: Bandolier
quote: Chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.
description: {{Color|u|18%}} {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}} chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that {{Color|u|resets all skill cooldowns}}.

name: Stun Grenade
quote: Chance to stun on hit.
description: {{Color|u|5%}} {{Stack|(+5% on stack)}} chance on hit to {{Color|u|stun}} enemies for {{Color|u|2 seconds}}.

name: Shaped Glass
quote: Double your damage... {{Color|#FF7F7F|BUT halve your health.}}
description: Increase base damage by {{Color|d|100%}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}}. {{Color|h|Reduce maximum health by 50%}} {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}}.

name: Brittle Crown
quote: Gain gold on hit... {{Color|#FF7F7F|BUT surrender gold on getting hit.}}
description:
{{Color|u|30% chance on hit}} to gain {{Color|u|2 {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} gold}}. {{Color|u|Scales over time.}}

{{Color|hp|Lose gold}} on taking damage equal to {{Color|hp|100%}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} of the {{Color|hp|maximum health percentage you lost}}.

name: Transcendence
quote: Convert all your health into shield. Increase maximum health.
description: {{Color|h|Convert}} all but {{Color|h|1 health}} into {{Color|h|regenerating shields}}. {{Color|h|Gain 50% {{Stack|(+25% per stack)}} maximum health}}.

name: Alien Head
quote: Reduces cooldowns for your skills.
description: {{Color|u|Reduce skill cooldowns}} by {{Color|u|25%}} {{Stack|(+25% per stack)}}.

name: Soulbound Catalyst
quote: Kills reduce equipment cooldown.
description: {{Color|d|Kills reduce}} {{Color|u|equipment cooldown}} by {{Color|u|4s}} {{Stack|(+2s per stack)}}.

name: Titanic Knurl
quote: Boosts health and regeneration.
description: {{Color|h|Increase maximum health}} by {{Color|h|40}} {{Stack|(+40 per stack)}} and {{Color|h|base health regeneration}} by {{Color|h|+1.6 hp/s}} {{Stack|(+1.6 hp/s per stack)}}.

name: Queen's Gland
quote: Recruit a Beetle Guard.
description: Every 30 seconds, {{Color|u|summon a Beetle Guard}} with bonus {{Color|d|300%}} damage and {{Color|h|100% health}}. Can have up to {{Color|u|1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} Guards at a time.

name: Energy Drink
quote: Increase sprint speed by +25%.
description: {{Color|u|Sprint speed}} is improved by {{Color|u|25%}} {{Stack|(+25% per stack)}}.

name: Backup Magazine
quote: Add an extra charge of your Secondary skill.
description: Add {{Color|u|+1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} charge of your {{Color|u|Secondary skill}}.

name: Sticky Bomb
quote: Chance on hit to attach a bomb to enemies.
description: {{Color|d|5%}} {{Stack|(+5% per stack)}} chance on hit to attach a {{Color|d|bomb}} to an enemy, detonating for {{Color|d|180%}} TOTAL damage.

name: Rusted Key
quote: Gain access to a Rusty Lockbox that contains a powerful item.
description: A {{Color|u|hidden cache}} containing an item ({{Color|h|80%}}/{{Color|hp|20%}}) will appear in a random location {{Color|u|on each stage}}. Opening the cache {{Color|u|consumes}} this item.

name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
quote: Deal extra damage to bosses.
description: Deal an additional {{Color|d|20%}} damage {{Stack|(+20% per stack)}} to bosses.

name: Rose Buckler
quote: Reduce incoming damage while sprinting.
description: {{Color|h|Increase armor}} by {{Color|h|30}} {{Stack|(+30 per stack)}} {{Color|u|while sprinting}}.

name: Runald's Band
quote: High damage hits also blasts enemies with runic ice. Recharges over time.
description: Hits that deal {{Color|d|more than 400% damage}} also blasts enemies with a {{Color|d|runic ice blast}}, {{Color|u|slowing}} them by {{Color|u|80%}} for {{Color|u|3s}} {{Stack|(+3s per stack)}} and dealing {{Color|d|250%}} {{Stack|(+250% per stack)}} TOTAL damage. Recharges every {{Color|u|10}} seconds.

name: Kjaro's Band
quote: High damage hits also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado. Recharges over time.
description: Hits that deal {{Color|d|more than 400% damage}} also blasts enemies with a {{Color|d|runic flame tornado}}, dealing {{Color|d|300%}} {{Stack|(+300% per stack)}} TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every {{Color|u|10}} seconds.

name: Chronobauble
quote: Slow enemies on hit.
description: {{Color|u|Slow}} enemies on hit for {{Color|u|-60% movement speed}} for {{Color|u|2s}} {{Stack|(+2s per stack)}}.

name: Dio's Best Friend
quote: Cheat death. Consumed on use.
description: {{Color|u|Upon death}}, this item will be {{Color|u|consumed}} and you will {{Color|h|return to life}} with {{Color|h|3 seconds of invulnerability}}.

name: Dio's Best Friend (Consumed)
description: A spent item with no remaining power.

name: Hardlight Afterburner
quote: Add 2 extra charges of your Utility skill. Reduce Utility skill cooldown.
description: Add {{Color|u|+2}} {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} charges of your {{Color|u|Utility skill}}. {{Color|u|Reduces Utility skill cooldown}} by {{Color|u|33%}}.

name: Wake of Vultures
quote: Temporarily steal the power of slain elites.
description: Gain the {{Color|d|power}} of any killed elite monster for {{Color|d|8s}} {{Stack|(+5s per stack)}}.

name: Brainstalks
quote: Skills have NO cooldowns for a short period after killing an elite.
description: Upon killing an elite monster, {{Color|d|enter a frenzy}} for {{Color|d|4s}} {{Stack|(+4s per stack)}} where {{Color|u|skills have 0.5s cooldowns}}.

name: Rejuvenation Rack
quote: Double the strength of healing.
description: {{Color|h|Heal +100%}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} more.

name: Corpsebloom
quote: Double your healing... {{Color|#FF7F7F|BUT it's applied over time.}}
description: {{Color|h|Heal +100%}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} more. {{Color|h|All healing is applied over time}}. Can {{Color|h|heal}} for a {{Color|h|maximum}} of {{Color|h|10%}} {{Stack|(-50% per stack)}} of your {{Color|h|health per second}}.

name: Gesture of the Drowned
quote: Dramatically reduce Equipment cooldown... {{Color|#FF7F7F|BUT it automatically activates.}}
description: {{Color|u|Reduce Equipment cooldown}} by {{Color|u|50%}} {{Stack|(+15% per stack)}}. Forces your Equipment to {{Color|u|activate}} whenever it is off {{Color|u|cooldown}}.

name: Old Guillotine
quote: Instantly kill low health Elite monsters.
description: Instantly kill Elite monsters below {{Color|hp|13% {{Stack|(+13% per stack)}} health}}.

name: War Horn
quote: Activating your Equipment gives you a burst of attack speed.
description: Activating your Equipment gives you {{Color|d|+70% attack speed}} for {{Color|d|8s}} {{Stack|(+4s per stack)}}.

name: Aegis
quote: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier.
description: Healing past full grants you a {{Color|h|temporary barrier}} for {{Color|h|50%}} {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}} of the amount you {{Color|h|healed}}.

name: Tonic Affliction
quote: {{Color|#FF7F7F|Reduce ALL stats when not under the effects of Spinel Tonic.}}
description: {{Color|#FF7F7F|Reduce ALL stats by -5% {{Stack|(-5% per stack)}}.}}

name: Halcyon Seed
quote: Summon Aurelionite during the Teleporter event.
description: Summon {{Color|d|Aurelionite}} during the teleporter event. It has {{Color|d|100% {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}} damage}} and {{Color|h|100% {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} health}}.

name: Little Disciple
quote: Fire tracking wisps while sprinting.
description: Fire a {{Color|d|tracking wisp}} for {{Color|d|300% {{Stack|(+300% per stack)}} damage}}. Fires every {{Color|u|1.6}} seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with {{Color|u|movement speed}}.

name: Topaz Brooch
quote: Gain a temporary barrier on kill.
description: Gain a {{Color|h|temporary barrier}} on kill for {{Color|h|15 health}} {{Stack|(+15 per stack)}}.

name: Shattering Justice
quote: Reduce the armor of enemies after repeatedly striking them.
description: After hitting an enemy {{Color|d|5}} times, reduce their {{Color|d|armor}} by {{Color|d|60}} for {{Color|d|8}} {{Stack|(+8 per stack)}} seconds.

name: Lepton Daisy
quote: Periodically release a healing nova during the Teleporter event and 'Holdout Zones' such as the Void Fields.
description: Release a {{Color|h|healing nova}} during the Teleporter event, {{Color|h|healing}} all nearby allies for {{Color|h|50%}} of their maximum health. Occurs {{Color|h|1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} times.

name: Focus Crystal
quote: Deal bonus damage to nearby enemies.
description: Increase damage to enemies within {{Color|d|13m}} by {{Color|d|20%}} {{Stack|(+20% per stack)}}.

name: Strides of Heresy
quote: Replace your Utility Skill with 'Shadowfade'.
description:
{{Color|u|Replace your Utility Skill}} with {{Color|u|Shadowfade}}.

Fade away, becoming {{Color|u|intangible}} and gaining {{Color|u|+30% movement speed}}. {{Color|h|Heal}} for {{Color|h|18.2% {{Stack|(+18.2% per stack)}} of your maximum health}}. Lasts 3 {{Stack|(+3 per stack)}} seconds.

name: Razorwire
quote: Retaliate in a burst of razors on taking damage.
description: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing {{Color|d|160% damage}}. Hits up to {{Color|d|5}} {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} targets in a {{Color|d|25m}} {{Stack|(+10m per stack)}} radius

name: Bison Steak
quote: Gain 25 max health.
description: Increases {{Color|h|maximum health}} by {{Color|h|25}} {{Stack|(+25 per stack)}}.

name: Pearl
quote: Increase your maximum health.
description: Increases {{Color|h|maximum health}} by {{Color|h|10%}} {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}}.

name: Irradiant Pearl
quote: Increase ALL of your stats.
description: Increases {{Color|u|ALL stats}} by {{Color|u|10%}} {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}}.

name: Ghor's Tome
quote: Chance on kill to drop a treasure.
description: {{Color|u|4%}} {{Stack|(+4% on stack)}} chance on kill to drop a treasure worth {{Color|u|$25}}. {{Color|u|Scales over time.}}

name: Resonance Disc
quote: Obtain a Resonance Disc charged by killing enemies. Fires automatically when fully charged.
description: Killing {{Color|d|4}} enemies in {{Color|u|7 seconds}} charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for {{Color|d|300%}} base damage {{Stack|(+300% per stack)}}, piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for {{Color|d|1000%}} base damage {{Stack|(+1000% per stack)}}. Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for {{Color|d|300%}} base damage {{Stack|(+300% per stack)}}.

name: Visions of Heresy
quote: Replace your Primary Skill with 'Hungering Gaze'.
description:
{{Color|u|Replace your Primary Skill}} with {{Color|u|Hungering Gaze}}.

Fire a flurry of {{Color|u|tracking shards}} that detonate after a delay, dealing {{Color|d|120%}} base damage. Hold up to 12 charges {{Stack|(+12 per stack)}} that reload after 2 seconds {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}}.

name: Genesis Loop
quote: Fire an electric nova at low health.
description: Falling below {{Color|hp|25% health}} causes you to explode, dealing {{Color|d|6000% base damage}}. Recharges every {{Color|u|30 / (2 {{Stack|+1 per stack}}) seconds}} .

name: Beads of Fealty
quote: Seems to do nothing... {{Color|#FF7F7F|but...}}
description: Seems to do nothing... {{Color|#FF7F7F|but...}}

name: Artifact Key
quote: A stone shard with immense power.
description: A stone shard with immense power.

name: Repulsion Armor Plate
quote: Receive flat damage reduction from all attacks.
description: Reduce all {{Color|d|incoming damage}} by {{Color|d|5{{Stack| (+5 per stack)}}}}. Cannot be reduced below {{Color|d|1}}.

name: Squid Polyp
quote: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret nearby.
description: Activating an interactable summons a {{Color|d|Squid Turret}} that attacks nearby enemies at {{Color|d|100% {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} attack speed}}. Lasts {{Color|u|30}} seconds.

name: Death Mark
quote: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, taking bonus damage.
description: Enemies with {{Color|d|4}} or more debuffs are {{Color|d|marked for death}}, increasing damage taken by {{Color|d|50%}} from all sources for {{Color|u|7}} {{Stack|(+7 per stack)}} seconds.

name: Interstellar Desk Plant
quote: Plant a healing fruit on kill.
description:
On kill, plant a {{Color|h|healing}} fruit seed that grows into a plant after {{Color|u|5}} seconds.

The plant {{Color|h|heals}} for {{Color|h|5%}} of {{Color|h|maximum health}} every 0.5 second to all allies within {{Color|h|10m}} {{Stack|(+5.0m per stack)}}. Lasts {{Color|u|10}} seconds.

name: Ancestral Incubator
quote: Chance on kill to summon an Ancestral Pod.
description:
{{Color|d|7%}} chance {{Stack|(+1% per stack)}} on kill to {{Color|u|summon an Ancestral Pod}} that distracts enemies.

Once it fully grows, it will hatch into an allied {{Color|d|Parent}} with {{Color|h|100% health}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}}.

name: Focused Convergence
quote: Increase the speed of Teleporter charging... {{Color|#FF7F7F|BUT reduce the size of the zone}}.
description: Teleporters charge {{Color|u|30% {{Stack|(+30% per stack)}} faster}}, but the size of the Teleporter zone is {{Color|hp|50%}} {{Stack|(-50% per stack)}} smaller.

name: Molten Perforator
quote: Chance on hit to fire magma balls.
description: {{Color|d|10%}} chance on hit to call forth {{Color|d|3 magma balls}} from an enemy, dealing {{Color|d|300%}} {{Stack|(+300% per stack)}} damage each.

name: Charged Perforator
quote: Chance on hit to call down a lightning strike.
description: {{Color|d|10%}} chance on hit to down a lightning strike, dealing {{Color|d|500%}} {{Stack|(+500% per stack)}} damage.

name: Shatterspleen
quote: Critical strikes always bleed enemies. Bleeding enemies now explode.
description: Gain {{Color|d|5% critical chance}}. {{Color|d|Critical Strikes bleed}} enemies for {{Color|d|240%}} base damage. {{Color|d|Bleeding}} enemies {{Color|d|explode}} on death for {{Color|d|400%}} {{Stack|(+400% per stack)}} damage, plus an additional {{Color|d|15%}} {{Stack|(+15% per stack)}} of their maximum health.

name: Mired Urn
quote: Siphon health from nearby enemies while in combat.
description: While in combat, the nearest 1 {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} enemies to you within {{Color|d|13m}} will be 'tethered' to you, dealing {{Color|d|100%}} damage per second, applying {{Color|d|tar}}, and {{Color|h|healing}} you for {{Color|h|100%}} of the damage dealt.

name: Defiant Gouge
quote: Using a Shrine summons enemies nearby.
description: Using a Shrine summons {{Color|hp|enemies}} {{Stack|(stronger per stack)}} nearby. {{Color|u|Scales over time.}}

name: Mercurial Rachis
quote: Randomly create a Ward of Power. ALL characters deal bonus damage while in the Ward.
description: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within {{Color|u|16m}} {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}}, causing them to deal {{Color|d|+50%}} damage.

name: Defensive Microbots
quote: Shoot down nearby projectiles. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.
description: Shoot down {{Color|d|1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} projectiles within {{Color|d|20m}} every {{Color|d|0.5 seconds}}. {{Color|u|Recharge rate scales with attack speed}}.

name: Item Scrap, White
quote: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Item Scrap, Green
quote: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Item Scrap, Red
quote: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Item Scrap, Yellow
quote: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Purity
quote: Reduce your skill cooldowns by 2 seconds. {{Color|#FF7F7F|You are unlucky.}}
description: All skill cooldowns are reduced by {{Color|u|2}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} seconds. All random effects are rolled {{Color|u|+1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} times for an {{Color|hp|unfavorable outcome}}.

name: Hooks of Heresy
quote: Replace your Secondary Skill with 'Slicing Maelstrom'.
description:
{{Color|u|Replace your Secondary Skill }} with {{Color|u|Slicing Maelstrom}}.

Charge up a projectile that deals {{Color|d|875% damage per second}} to nearby enemies, exploding after {{Color|u|3}} seconds to deal {{Color|d|700% damage}} and {{Color|d|root}} enemies for {{Color|u|3}} {{Stack|(+3 per stack)}} seconds. Recharges after 5 {{Stack|(+5 per stack)}} seconds.

name: Empathy Cores
quote: Recruit a pair of Solus Probes that gain power with more allies.
description: Every 30 seconds, {{Color|u|summon two Solus Probes}} that gain {{Color|d|+100%}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} damage per {{Color|u|ally on your team}}.

name: Planula
quote: Receive flat healing when attacked.
description: Heal from {{Color|d|incoming damage}} for {{Color|h|15{{Stack| (+15 per stack)}}}}.

name: Essence of Heresy
quote: Replace your Special Skill with 'Ruin'.
description:
{{Color|u|Replace your Special Skill}} with {{Color|u|Ruin}}.

Dealing damage adds a stack of {{Color|d|Ruin}} for 10 {{Stack|(+10 per stack)}} seconds. Activating the skill {{Color|d|detonates}} all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing {{Color|d|300% damage}} plus {{Color|d|120% damage per stack of Ruin}}. Recharges after 8 {{Stack|(+8 per stack)}} seconds.

name: Mocha
quote: Slightly increase attack speed and movement speed.
description: Increases {{Color|d|attack speed}} by {{Color|d|7.5%}} {{Stack|(+7.5 per stack)}} and {{Color|u|movement speed}} by {{Color|u|7%}} {{Stack|(+7% per stack)}}.

name: Plasma Shrimp
quote: While you have shield, fire missiles on every hit. {{Color|v|Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s}}.
description: Gain a {{Color|h|shield}} equal to {{Color|h|10%}} of your maximum health. While you have a {{Color|h|shield}}, hitting an enemy fires a missile that deals {{Color|d|40%}} {{Stack|(+40% per stack)}} TOTAL damage. {{Color|v|Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s}}.

name: Safer Spaces
quote: Block the next source of damage. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Tougher Times}}.
description: {{Color|h|Blocks}} incoming damage once. Recharges after {{Color|u|15 seconds}} {{Stack|(-10% per stack)}} {{Color|v|Corrupts all Tougher Times}}.

name: Shuriken
quote: Activating your Primary skill also throws a shuriken. Recharges over time.
description: Activating your {{Color|u|Primary skill}} also throws a {{Color|d|shuriken}} that deals {{Color|d|400%}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} base damage. You can hold up to {{Color|u|3}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} {{Color|d|shurikens}} which all reload over {{Color|u|10}} seconds.

name: Laser Scope
quote: Your 'Critical Strikes' deal an additional 100% damage.
description: {{Color|d|Critical Strikes}} deal an additional {{Color|d|100% damage}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}}.

name: Spare Drone Parts
quote: Your drones fire faster, have less cooldowns, shoot missiles, and gain a bonus chaingun.
description: Gain {{Color|d|Col. Droneman}}. Drones gain {{Color|d|+50%}} {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}} attack speed and cooldown reduction. Drones gain {{Color|d|10%}} chance to fire a {{Color|d|missile}} on hit, dealing {{Color|d|300%}} TOTAL damage. Drones gain an {{Color|d|automatic chain gun}} that deals {{Color|d|6x100%}} damage, bouncing to {{Color|d|2}} enemies.

name: Hunter's Harpoon
quote: Killing an enemy gives you a burst of movement speed.
description: Killing an enemy increases {{Color|u|movement speed}} by {{Color|u|125%}}, fading over {{Color|u|1}} {{Stack|(+0.5 per stack)}} seconds.

name: Ignition Tank
quote: Your ignite effects deal quadruple damage.
description: Ignite effects deal {{Color|d|+300%}} {{Stack|(+300% per stack)}} more damage over time.

name: Power Elixir
quote: Receive an instant heal at low health. Consumed on use.
description: Taking damage to below {{Color|hp|25% health}} {{Color|u|consumes}} this item, {{Color|h|healing}} you for {{Color|h|75%}} of {{Color|h|maximum health}}.

name: Empty Bottle
description: An empty container for an Elixir. Does nothing.

name: Symbiotic Scorpion
quote: Permanently reduce armor on hit.
description: {{Color|d|100%}} chance on hit to reduce {{Color|d|armor}} by {{Color|d|2}} {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} {{Color|d|permanently}}.

name: Pocket I.C.B.M.
quote: All Missile items deal more damage and fire an additional two missiles.
description: All missile items and equipment fire an additional {{Color|d|2}} {{Color|d|missiles}}. Increase missile damage by {{Color|d|0%}} {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}}

name: Weeping Fungus
quote: Heal while sprinting. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Bustling Fungi}}.
description: {{Color|h|Heals}} for {{Color|h|2%}} {{Stack|(+2% per stack)}} of your health every second {{Color|u|while sprinting}}. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Bustling Fungi}}.

name: Stone Flux Pauldron
quote: Double your health... {{Color|hp|BUT halve your speed.}}
description: Increase {{Color|h|max health}} by {{Color|h|100% {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}}}}. Reduce {{Color|u|movement speed}} by {{Color|u|50%}} {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}}.

name: Light Flux Pauldron
quote: Halve your cooldowns.. {{Color|hp|BUT halve your attack speed.}}
description: Decrease {{Color|u|skill cooldowns}} by {{Color|u|50% {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}}}}. Decrease {{Color|d|attack speed}} by {{Color|d|50%}} {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}}.

name: Eulogy Zero
quote: Items and equipment have a small chance to transform into a Lunar item instead.
description: Items have a {{Color|u|5%}} {{Stack|(+5% per stack)}} chance to become a {{Color|lunar|Lunar}} item instead.

name: Ben's Raincoat
quote: Prevent debuffs, instead gaining a temporary barrier. Recharges over time.
description: Prevents {{Color|u|1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} {{Color|d|debuff}} and instead grants a {{Color|h|temporary barrier}} for {{Color|h|10%}} of {{Color|h|maximum health}}. Recharges every {{Color|u|5}} seconds.

name: Regenerating Scrap
quote: Prioritized when used with {{Color|h|Uncommon}} 3D Printers. Usable once per stage.
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with {{Color|h|Uncommon}} 3D Printers. At the start of each stage, it regenerates.

name: Regenerating Scrap (Consumed)
description: At the start of each stage, it transforms into Regenerating Scrap.

name: Lost Seer's Lenses
quote: Gain a 0.5% chance to instantly kill a non-boss enemy. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses}}.
description: Your attacks have a {{Color|d|0.5%}} {{Stack|(+0.5% per stack)}} chance to {{Color|d|instantly kill}} a {{Color|d|non-Boss enemy}}. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses}}.

name: Voidsent Flame
quote: Full health enemies also detonate on hit. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps}}.
description: Upon hitting an enemy at {{Color|d|full health}}, spawn a {{Color|d|lava pillar}} in a {{Color|d|12m}} {{Stack|(+2.4m per stack)}} radius for {{Color|d|260%}} {{Stack|(+156% per stack)}} base damage. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps}}.

name: Needletick
quote: Chance to collapse enemies on hit. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers}}.
description: {{Color|d|10%}} {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}} chance to {{Color|d|collapse}} an enemy for {{Color|d|400%}} base damage. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers}}.

name: Polylute
quote: Chance to repeatedly strike a single enemy with lightning. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Ukuleles}}.
description: {{Color|d|25%}} chance to fire {{Color|d|lightning}} for {{Color|d|60%}} TOTAL damage up to {{Color|d|3 {{Stack|(+3 per stack)}}}} times. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Ukuleles}}.

name: Encrusted Key
quote: Gain access to an Encrusted Cache that contains a void item. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Rusted Keys}}.
description: A {{Color|u|hidden cache}} containing an item (60%/{{Color|h|30%}}/{{Color|hp|10%}}) will appear in a random location {{Color|u|on each stage}}. Opening the cache {{Color|u|consumes}} this item. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Rusted Keys}}.

name: Benthic Bloom
quote: Upgrades your items at the start of each stage. {{Color|v|Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers}}.
description: {{Color|u|Upgrades 3}} {{Stack|(+3 per stack)}} random items to items of the next {{Color|u|higher rarity}} at the {{Color|u|start of each stage}}. {{Color|v|Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers}}.

name: Tentabauble
quote: Chance to root enemies on hit. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Chronobaubles}}.
description: {{Color|u|5%}} {{Stack|(+5% per stack)}} chance on hit to {{Color|d|root}} enemies for {{Color|u|1s}} {{Stack|(+1s per stack)}}. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Chronobaubles}}.

name: Lysate Cell
quote: Add an extra charge of your Special skill. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Fuel Cells}}.
description: Add {{Color|u|+1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} charge of your {{Color|u|Special skill}}. {{Color|u|Reduces Special skill cooldown}} by {{Color|u|33%}}. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Fuel Cells}}.

name: Pluripotent Larva
quote: Get a {{Color|v|corrupted}} extra life. Consumed on use. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends}}.
description: {{Color|u|Upon death}}, this item will be {{Color|u|consumed}} and you will {{Color|h|return to life}} with {{Color|h|3 seconds of invulnerability}}, and all of your items that can be {{Color|u|corrupted}} will be. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends}}.

name: Pluripotent Larva (Consumed)
description: A spent item with no remaining power.

name: Delicate Watch
quote: Deal bonus damage. Breaks at low health.
description: Increase damage by {{Color|d|20%}} {{Stack|(+20% per stack)}}. Taking damage to below {{Color|hp|25% health}} {{Color|u|breaks}} this item.

name: Delicate Watch (Broken)
description: ...well, it's still right twice a day.

name: Oddly-shaped Opal
quote: Reduce damage the first time you are hit.
description: {{Color|h|Increase armor}} by {{Color|h|100}} {{Stack|(+100 per stack)}} while out of danger.

name: Roll of Pennies
quote: Gain gold on taking damage.
description: Gain {{Color|u|3 {{Stack|(+3 per stack)}} gold}} on {{Color|d|taking damage}} from an enemy. {{Color|u|Scales over time.}}

name: Bottled Chaos
quote: Activating your Equipment triggers an additional, random Equipment effect.
description: Trigger a {{Color|d|random equipment}} effect {{Color|d|1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} time(s).

name: Shipping Request Form
quote: Get a delivery each stage that contains powerful items.
description: A {{Color|u|delivery}} containing 2 items (79%/{{Color|h|20%}}/{{Color|hp|1%}}) will appear in a random location {{Color|u|on each stage}}. {{Stack|(Increases rarity chances of the items per stack).}}

name: Singularity Band
quote: High damage hits also create unstable black holes. Recharges over time. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands}}.
description: Hits that deal {{Color|d|more than 400% damage}} also fire a black hole that {{Color|u|draws enemies within 15m into its center}}. Lasts {{Color|u|5}} seconds before collapsing, dealing {{Color|d|100%}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} TOTAL damage. Recharges every {{Color|u|20}} seconds. {{Color|v|Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands}}.

name: Egocentrism
quote: Gain multiple orbiting bombs. {{Color|hp|Every minute, assimilate another item into Egocentrism.}}
description: Every {{Color|u|3}} {{Stack|(-50% per stack)}} seconds, gain an {{Color|d|orbiting bomb}} that detonates on impact for {{Color|d|360%}} damage, up to a maximum of {{Color|u|3 bombs}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}}. Every {{Color|u|60}} seconds, a random item is {{Color|u|converted}} into this item.

name: Defense Nucleus
quote: Summon an Alpha Construct on killing an elite.
description: Killing elite monsters spawns an {{Color|d|Alpha Construct}} with bonus {{Color|d|300%}} damage and {{Color|h|300% health}}. Limited to {{Color|u|4}} {{Stack|(+4 per stack)}}.

name: Newly Hatched Zoea
quote: Periodically recruit allies from the {{Color|v|Void}}. {{Color|v|Corrupts all}} {{Color|boss|yellow items}}.
description: Every {{Color|u|60}} {{Stack|(-50% per stack)}} seconds, gain a random {{Color|v|Void}} ally. Can have up to {{Color|u|1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} allies at a time. {{Color|v|Corrupts all}} {{Color|boss|yellow items}}.

name: Growth Nectar
quote: Your buffs grant an increase to ALL of your stats.
description: Grants 4% increase to {{Color|u|ALL stats}} for each buff, up to a maximum of {{Color|u|4}} {{Stack|(+4 per stack)}}.

name: Chance Doll
quote: Gain 40% chance to increase item rarity at Shrines of Chance.
description: On Shrine of Chance success, {{Color|u|40%}} {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}} chance to get higher rarity items.

name: Breaching Fin
quote: Grounded enemies hit with any skill are launched and take bonus damage.
description: Grounded enemies hit with any {{Color|u|skill}} are {{Color|u|launched}} and {{Color|u|stunned}}. Enemies hit while airborne are {{Color|u|launched}} again up to {{Color|u|2 times}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}}. Launched enemies take increased damage by {{Color|d|10%}} from all sources per launch. Recharges after {{Color|u|15s}}.

name: Bolstering Lantern
quote: Increases your attack speed for every nearby enemy and ally.
description: Increase your {{Color|d|attack speed}} by {{Color|d|10%}} {{Stack|(+3.5% per stack)}} for up to {{Color|u|3}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} enemies and allies within {{Color|u|20}} meters.

name: Luminous Shot
quote: Activating your Secondary skill charges your Primary skill with powerful lightning strikes. Requires 3 charges.
description: Activating {{Color|u|Secondary skill}} stores up to {{Color|u|5 charges}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}}. Requires {{Color|u|3 charges}} for your {{Color|u|Primary skill}} to fire lightning strikes, dealing {{Color|d|175% TOTAL damage}} {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}} each. {{Color|u|Reduces Secondary skill cooldown by 20%}}.

name: Sale Star
quote: First chest bought yields more than one reward. Usable once per stage.
description: Gain an extra item on the first chest opened per stage. {{Stack|Each additional Sale Star increases the chance of getting more items by 5%}}.

name: Sale Star (Consumed)
quote: At the start of each stage, it transforms into Sale Star.
description: At the start of each stage, it transforms into Sale Star.

name: Elusive Antlers
quote: Spawns orbs of energy that give bonus movement speed.
description: Spawns orbs of energy nearby every {{Color|u|10s}} {{Stack|(-10% per stack)}}, giving {{Color|u|+12% movement speed}} up to {{Color|u|3}} {{Stack|(+3 per stack)}} {{Color|u|times}} for {{Color|u|12s}}.

name: Sonorous Whispers
quote: Upon large or elite monster kill chance to drop items.
description: When a large monster is killed it will always drop an item. All elites have a {{Color|u|4%}} chance of dropping an item {{Stack|(+1% per stack)}}.

name: Electric Boomerang
quote: On hit chance to throw a stunning boomerang.
description: {{Color|d|15%}} chance on hit to fire an electric boomerang that slices through enemies dealing {{Color|d|120% base damage}} {{Stack|(+120% per stack)}} and deals an additional {{Color|d|120% base damage per second}} and {{Color|d|stuns}} all enemies hit. Can {{Color|d|strike}} enemies on the way back.

name: Noxious Thorn
quote: Killing an enemy transfers debuffs to a nearby enemy.
description: Gain {{Color|d|10%}} chance to {{Color|d|bleed}} an enemy. On killing an enemy, {{Color|d|transfer 33%}} of every debuff stack to {{Color|d|1 enemy}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} within 20m {{Stack|(+5m per stack)}}.

name: Chronic Expansion
quote: Deal bonus damage for each enemy killed
description: Killing an enemy increase your damage by {{Color|d|3.5}} {{Stack|(+1% per stack)}}, up to {{Color|u|10}} {{Stack|(+5 per stack)}}, for {{Color|u|7s}}. Dealing damage refreshes the timer.

name: War Bonds
quote: Bombard boss events with missiles. The more gold earned, the more UES support is granted.
description: During boss events, {{Color|u|5}} missiles bombard the area, dealing {{Color|d|2.5%}} {{Stack|(+2.5% per stack)}} {{Color|d|of boss' Max Health in damage}}. Before the boss event, gain additional missiles, up to a maximum of {{Color|u|20}} {{Stack|(+5 per stack)}}, per {{Color|u|50}} gold gained. {{Color|u|Gold requirement scales over time.}}

name: Warped Echo
quote: Incoming damage is reduced and dealt over time.
description: The next source of damage is {{Color|h|reduced}} by {{Color|h|20%}} and {{Color|h|spread}} into {{Color|u|3}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} {{Color|u|hits}}. All echoed damage is {{Color|u|non-lethal}} except for the final hit. Recharges every {{Color|u|15s}}.

name: Unstable Transmitter
quote: Gain a temporary barrier and a dimensional aura on low health.
description: Falling below {{Color|hp|25% health}} gives you {{Color|h|temporary barrier}} and a dimensional aura that {{Color|d|bleeds}} and {{Color|u|teleports}} away enemies for {{Color|u|8s}}. {{Color|d|Enemies killed}} by the aura {{Color|u|extend}} the duration by 1s. At the start of each stage, it regenerates

name: Unstable Transmitter (Consumed)
description: At the start of each stage, it transforms into Unstable Transmitter.

name: Prayer Beads
quote: Gains experience alongside you. Upon removal, grants bonus stats.
description: Grows by gaining experience, storing {{Color|u|20%}} {{Stack|(+5% per item stack)}} bonus stats ({{Color|h|health}}, {{Color|h|regeneration}}, and {{Color|d|damage}}). On removal, gain all stored stats.

name: Runic Lens
quote: Chance to call down a meteor. Damage and chance are increased with higher damage hits.
description: {{Color|d|3%}} chance on hit to call a meteor strike, dealing {{Color|d|2000%}} base damage. Every {{Color|d|100%}} attack damage dealt increase the activation chance by {{Color|d|3%}} {{Stack|(+3% per stack)}} and damage by {{Color|d|150%}} {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}}.

name: Longstanding Solitude
quote: Free purchases on Level Up. {{Color|#FF7F7F|Gold converts to Experience.}}
description: {{Color|u|On level up}} gain a free unlock for the next purchase {{Stack|(+1 free unlock per item stack)}} but {{Color|#FF7F7F|all gold is converted to experience}}. Anything that costs gold is increased by 50% {{Stack|(+50% per item stack)}}

name: Eclipse Lite
quote: Gain a small temporary barrier when a skill comes off cooldown.
description: When a skill comes off cooldown, gain a {{Color|d|temporary barrier}} for {{Color|h|1%}} {{Stack|(+0.25% per stack)}} of your maximum health per second of the skill's base cooldown.

name: Hiker's Boots
quote: Striking enemies from a higher elevation grants critical strike chance and damage.
description: Striking enemies from a higher elevation grants {{Color|d|+1%}} {{Stack|(+1% per stack)}} {{Color|d|critical strike chance}} and {{Color|d|critical strike damage}}, up to {{Color|u|10 times}}. Lasts 10 seconds.

name: Box of Dynamite
quote: Your drones periodically drop dynamite.
description: Gain {{Color|d|Lt. Droneboy}}. While in combat, your drones drop sticks of dynamite that detonate for {{Color|d|240% damage}} {{Stack|(+85% per stack)}}, stunning enemies. Recharges after {{Color|u|10}} seconds.

name: Collector's Compulsion
quote: Pickups grant a stacking bonus to all stats. Open a barrel to find a minor pick-up.
description: Picking up {{Color|d|an item or other collectible}} increases {{Color|u|all stats}} by {{Color|u|+3% for 20 seconds, up to 3}} {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} {{Color|u|times}}. Barrels grant minor pickups.

name: Faraday Spur
quote: Moving around builds up movement speed and jump height. At 25% charge or higher, jump to discharge into an electric blast.
description: Moving around builds up {{Color|u|charge}}, granting up to {{Color|u|+160% movement speed}} and {{Color|u|+200% jump height}} at 100%. At 25% charge or higher, jumping triggers an {{Color|d|explosive discharge}} for {{Color|d|400%}} {{Stack|(+280% per stack)}} {{Color|d|damage}} in a 5m to 32.3m {{Stack|(+7.5m per stack)}} area.

name: Kinetic Dampener
quote: Gain bonus armor while you have a shield. When shield breaks, release a stunning pulse that deals more damage the more shield you have.
description: Increases armor by {{Color|u|30}} {{Stack|(+30 per stack)}} while you have a shield. When shield breaks, release a stunning pulse for {{Color|d|100% damage}} plus an amount {{Color|d|equal to 100%}} {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}} {{Color|d|of your max shield}}. Grants a shield for {{Color|h|4% of your max health}}.

name: Networked Suffering
quote: Inflict a computer virus on hit that spreads a portion of all damage dealt between infected enemies. Affects up to 4 enemies.
description: Infect up to {{Color|u|4}} {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} enemies with a computer virus that duplicates {{Color|d|50% of all damage taken}} and sends it to a global damage pool. Every 3 seconds, ALL infected enemies suffer {{Color|d|100% pooled damage}}.

name: Orphaned Core
quote: Gain a buddy who launches itself at enemies to deal damage. Inherits your movement-related items.
description: Gain a {{Color|h|friendly Solus unit}} that launches itself at enemies for {{Color|d|400%}} {{Stack|(+400% per stack)}} {{Color|d|damage}}. The unit inherits your {{Color|u|movement speed items}} and deals {{Color|d|more damage the faster it moves}}. The unit can be pet to {{Color|u|cleanse negative effects}}. Recharges after 15 seconds.

name: Substandard Duplicator
quote: Picking up an item grants a temporary copy.
description: {{Color|u|Picking up an item}} gives you a {{Color|t|temporary copy}} of itself. Temporary items last an additional {{Color|d|10}} {{Stack|(+10 per stack)}} {{Color|d|seconds}}.

name: Encrypted Cerebellum
quote: Contains encrypted remnants of the Collective network. Needs to be decrypted.
description: Contains encrypted remnants of the Collective network. Needs to be decrypted before it can be returned.

name: Exposed Cerebellum
quote: A swarming data nexus representing the Collective network. Can be given to a powerful entity.
description: A swarming data nexus representing the Collective network. Can be given to a powerful entity.

name: Faulty Conductor
quote: Occasionally release a pulse of electricity that energizes allies and makes enemies more susceptible to electric damage.
description: Every {{Color|u|15}} {{Stack|(-20% per stack)}} {{Color|u|seconds}}, release a wave of electricity that {{Color|h|energizes}} nearby allies for {{Color|u|7}} seconds. Energized allies gain {{Color|d|+30% attack and movement speed}}, and ALWAYS land {{Color|d|critical strikes}} with {{Color|u|electric}} items and attacks.

name: Functional Coupler
quote: Hold an additional equipment.
description: Hold {{Color|u|1 additional equipment}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}}. Press the {{Color|u|interact}} and {{Color|u|equipment}} buttons to cycle through held equipment.

name: Prison Matrix
quote: Gain {{Color|u|+50% armor}}. Can be placed in a Matrix Terminal.
description: Gain {{Color|u|+50% armor}}. Can be placed in a Matrix Terminal.

name: Sentry Key
quote: Gain {{Color|u|+15% move speed}}. Can be placed in a Sentry Terminal.
description: Gain {{Color|u|+15% move speed}}. Can be placed in a Sentry Terminal or used for decryption.

name: Neutronium Weight
quote: {{Color|hp|Reduces all stats while in combat}}, but can be sent to an enemy on hit.
description:
{{Color|hp|Reduces your stats while in combat}}, but {{Color|u|send this item to an enemy}} on hit. On death, this item will be sent to its holder's killer.

Reduces {{Color|d|damage}} by 30% {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}}, {{Color|d|attack speed}} by 30% {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}}, {{Color|u|movement speed}} by 30% {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}}, and {{Color|u|armor}} by 35 {{Stack|(+15 per stack)}}.

name: Disposable Missile Launcher
quote: Fire a swarm of missiles.
description: Fire a swarm of {{Color|d|12}} missiles that deal {{Color|d|12x300% damage}}.

name: Foreign Fruit
quote: Heal on use.
description: Instantly heal for {{Color|h|50% of your maximum health}}.

name: Glowing Meteorite
quote: Rain meteors from the sky, {{Color|#FF7F7F|hurting both enemies and allies.}}
description: {{Color|d|Rain meteors}} from the sky, damaging ALL characters for {{Color|d|600% damage per blast}}. Lasts 20 seconds.

name: Primordial Cube
quote: Fire a black hole that draws enemies in.
description: Fire a black hole that {{Color|u|draws enemies within 30m into its center}}. Lasts 10 seconds

name: Ocular HUD
quote: Gain 100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.
description: Gain {{Color|d|+100% Critical Strike Chance}} for 8 seconds.

name: The Back-up
quote: Call drones for back up. Lasts 25 seconds.
description: Call {{Color|d|4 Strike Drones}} to fight for you. Lasts 25 seconds.

name: Preon Accumulator
quote: Fire a ball of energy that electrocutes nearby enemies before detonating.
description: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m for up to {{Color|d|600% damage/second}}. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for {{Color|d|4000% damage}}.

name: Milky Chrysalis
quote: Gain temporary flight.
description: Sprout wings and {{Color|u|fly for 15 seconds}}. Gain {{Color|u|+20% movement speed}} for the duration.

name: Royal Capacitor
quote: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster.
description: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing {{Color|d|3000% damage}} and {{Color|d|stunning}} nearby monsters.

name: The Crowdfunder
quote: Toggle to fire. Costs gold per bullet.
description: Fires a continuous barrage that deals {{Color|d|100% damage per bullet}}. Costs $1 per bullet. Cost increases over time.

name: Gnarled Woodsprite
quote: Heal over time. Activate to send to an ally.
description: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for {{Color|h|1.5% of your maximum health/second}}. Can be sent to an ally to heal them for {{Color|h|10% of their maximum health}}.

name: Ifrit's Distinction
quote: Become an aspect of fire.
description: Become an aspect of fire.

name: Silence Between Two Strikes
quote: Become an aspect of lightning.
description: Become an aspect of lightning.

name: Her Biting Embrace
quote: Become an aspect of ice.
description: Become an aspect of ice.

name: N'kuhana's Retort
quote: Become an aspect of corruption.
description: Become an aspect of corruption.

name: Spectral Circlet
quote: Become an aspect of incorporeality.
description: Become an aspect of incorporeality.

name: Shared Design
quote: Become an aspect of perfection.
description: Become an aspect of perfection.

name: Helfire Tincture
quote: Burn everything nearby... {{Color|#FF7F7F|including you and allies.}}
description: Ignite ALL characters within 15m for 12s. Deal {{Color|d|5% of your maximum health/second as burning}} as damage. The burn is {{Color|d|0.5x}} stronger on yourself, {{Color|d|0.25x}} stronger on allies, and {{Color|d|24x}} stronger on enemies.

name: Radar Scanner
quote: Reveal all nearby interactables.
description: {{Color|u|Reveal}} all interactables within 500m for {{Color|u|10 seconds}}.

name: Effigy of Grief
quote: Drop a permanent effigy that cripples ALL characters inside. Can place up to 5.
description: ALL characters within are {{Color|u|slowed by 50%}} and have their {{Color|d|armor reduced by 20}}. Can place up to {{Color|u|5}}.

name: Eccentric Vase
quote: Create a quantum tunnel between two locations.
description: Create a {{Color|u|quantum tunnel}} of up to {{Color|u|1000m}} in length. Lasts 30 seconds.

name: Spinel Tonic
quote: Gain a massive boost to ALL stats. {{Color|#FF7F7F|Chance to gain an affliction that reduces ALL stats.}}
description:
Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 20 seconds. Increases {{Color|d|damage}} by {{Color|d|+100%}}. Increases {{Color|d|attack speed}} by {{Color|d|+70%}}. Increases {{Color|d|armor}} by {{Color|d|+20}}. Increases {{Color|h|maximum health}} by {{Color|h|+50%}}. Increases {{Color|h|passive health regeneration}} by {{Color|h|+300%}}. Increases {{Color|u|movespeed}} by {{Color|u|+30%}}.

When the Tonic wears off, you have a {{Color|hp|20%}} chance to gain a {{Color|hp|Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats}} by {{Color|hp|-5%}} {{Stack|(-5% per stack)}}.

name: Fuel Array
quote: Looks like it could power something. {{Color|#FF7F7F|EXTREMELY unstable...}}
description: Looks like it could power something. {{Color|#FF7F7F|EXTREMELY unstable...}}

name: Blast Shower
quote: Cleanse all negative effects.
description: {{Color|u|Cleanse}} all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.

name: Volcanic Egg
quote: Transform into a speeding draconic fireball, dealing damage as you pass through enemies.
description: Turn into a {{Color|d|draconic fireball}} for {{Color|d|5}} seconds. Deal {{Color|d|500% damage}} on impact. Detonates at the end for {{Color|d|800% damage}}.

name: Jade Elephant
quote: Gain massive armor for 5 seconds.
description: Gain {{Color|d|500 armor}} for {{Color|u|5 seconds}}.

name: Sawmerang
quote: Throw a fan of buzzing saws that come back to you.
description: Throw {{Color|d|three large saw blades}} that slice through enemies for {{Color|d|3x400%}} damage. Also deals an additional {{Color|d|3x100% damage per second}} while {{Color|d|bleeding}} enemies. Can {{Color|d|strike}} enemies again on the way back.

name: Recycler
quote: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only recycle once.
description: {{Color|u|Transform}} an Item or Equipment into a different one. {{Color|u|Can only be converted into the same tier one time}}.

name: Super Massive Leech
quote: Heal for a percentage of the damage you deal for 8 seconds.
description: {{Color|h|Heal}} for {{Color|h|20%}} of the {{Color|d|damage}} you deal. Lasts {{Color|h|8}} seconds.

name: Gorag's Opus
quote: You and all your allies enter a frenzy.
description: All allies enter a {{Color|d|frenzy}} for {{Color|u|7}} seconds. Increases {{Color|u|movement speed}} by {{Color|u|50%}} and {{Color|d|attack speed}} by {{Color|d|100%}}.

name: Forgive Me Please
quote: Throw a cursed doll that repeatedly triggers your 'On Kill' effects.
description: Throw a cursed doll out that {{Color|d|triggers}} any {{Color|d|On-Kill}} effects you have every {{Color|u|1}} second for {{Color|u|8}} seconds.

name: Trophy Hunter's Tricorn
quote: Execute a large monster and claim its {{Color|d|trophy.}} Consumed on use.
description: {{Color|d|Execute}} any enemy capable of spawning a {{Color|d|unique reward}}, and it will drop that {{Color|d|item}}. Equipment is {{Color|u|consumed}} on use.

name: Trophy Hunter's Tricorn (Consumed)
description: Looks kinda cool, but that's about it.

name: Goobo Jr.
quote: Create a clone of you for 30 seconds.
description: Spawn a gummy clone that has {{Color|d|300% damage}} and {{Color|h|300% health}}. Expires in {{Color|u|30}} seconds.

name: Molotov (6-Pack)
quote: Throw 6 flaming molotovs that ignite enemies upon shattering.
description: Throw {{Color|d|6}} molotov cocktails that {{Color|d|ignites}} enemies for {{Color|d|500% base damage}}. Each molotov leaves a burning area for {{Color|d|200% damage per second}}.

name: Executive Card
quote: Gain 10% cash back on all purchases. Multishops remain open.
description: Whenever you make a gold purchase, get {{Color|u|10%}} of the spent gold back. If the purchase is a {{Color|u|multishop}} terminal, the other terminals will {{Color|u|remain open}}.

name: Remote Caffeinator
quote: Request a healing soda machine.
description: Request an {{Color|d|Eclipse Zero Vending Machine}} from the {{Color|d|UES Safe Travels}}. Delivery guaranteed in {{Color|u|5 seconds}}, dealing {{Color|d|2000% damage}}. {{Color|h|Heal}} up to 3 targets for {{Color|h|25% of their maximum health}}.

name: His Reassurance
quote: Become an aspect of earth.
description: Become an aspect of earth.

name: Seed of Life
quote: Revives the user when killed or dead allies on activation. Consumed on use.
description: Revives the user when killed or dead allies on activation. Consumed on use.

name: Seed of Life (Consumed)
quote: On activation places a sprout that drops healing orbs.
description: On activation places a sprout that drops healing orbs.

name: Aurelionite's Blessing
quote: Become an aspect of radiance.
description: Become an aspect of radiance.

name: His Spiteful Boon
quote: Become an aspect of spite.
description: Become an aspect of spite.

name: Deus Ex Machina
quote: Counter any damage. Successful counters {{Color|#E6CA65|bless}} your next attack, ensuring your on-hit effects ALWAYS activate.
description: Briefly enter a countering stance that lets you parry {{Color|u|any and ALL}} damage. A successful parry {{Color|h|nullifies incoming damage}}, reduces your equipment cooldown by {{Color|d|75%}}, and grants {{Color|#E6CA65|Blessing}}, causing your next attack to ALWAYS activate your on-hit effects.

name: Of One Mind
quote: Become an aspect of the Collective.
description: Become an aspect of the Collective.
